snippet.title: Dying Light 2: Cloud Version - Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct
snippet.description:
Dying Light 2: Stay Human brings Dying Light 2 to Nintendo Switch using cloud streaming. This version will be available February 4, 2022. Dying Light Platinum Edition is also coming to Nintendo Switch on October 19, 2021.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
